1395240.name: Rhythm of the Universe: Ionia Soundtrack
1395240.description:
The Official Soundtrack for IONIA captures the music-inspired adventure that takes place in a lush forest teeming with life. The story begins with haunting voices reminiscent of the god Pann which leads to orchestral scale arrangements that showcase the Valley of Harmony and other iconic areas you will discover.



The Rhythm of the Universe: Ionia Soundtrack is composed by Emir Cerman and Simone Scazzocchio. Included are special guest compositions by Suhyun Kim. Featured international and award-winning singers include Shea Rose, Ayumi Ueda, and Jasna Gara. All tracks were produced, mixed, and mastered by Simone Scazzocchio.

ROTU Entertainment is proud to support Wildlife Warriors USA Inc. For every purchase of Rhythm of the Universe: Ionia on the Steam United States “app” stores, ROTU Entertainment will donate 5% of its gross proceeds to Wildlife Warriors USA Inc.
